meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin Summers Alvin Chin Thomas Phillips Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7017.

td.p: Erin Summers, an actuary from Reno, Nevada
Alvin Chin, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey
Thomas Phillips, a graduate student originally from Greenville, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,601)

tr.td: THE CARTER FAMILY
(Alex: Think politics, not music.)
SNAKES
BOB RHYME
STATE CAPITAL HEADQUARTERS
ALL THINGS GOLDEN
(Meryl Davis: I'm Meryl Davis.) (Charlie White: And I'm Charlie White. We're the first Americans to win an Olympic gold medal in ice dancing.) (Meryl: We're going to take you inside the world of...)

Alvin
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
